name: Snake-Eyes
description:
Made by me for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam!

The mysterious agent "Snake-Eyes" is well-known in the business of ghost hunting as the "most consistent guy you can get... most of the time". Play as Snake-Eyes as he takes on his most challenging mission yet - exterminating the ghosts at an abandoned Casino. Only - for some reason, it seems like they never stop coming...

Upgrade your dual-wield weapons with dice which re-roll each round to determine the weapons' strength, but if you roll two 1s your weapon will become Jammed, causing unwanted side effects - so don't get too greedy! 

Credits

Programming and art by me.

Sounds all CC0 from Freesound.org

Music is 'Kellis Number' by US Army Blues, from pixabay.com
